DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomize clinical trial use permethrin treatment clothing prevent Lyme disease . Subjects ( N=200 ) recruit camp staff participate study screen inclusion exclusion criteria.Qualifying subject randomize either treatment ( N=100 ) non-treatment arm ( N=100 ) . Subjects treatment arm scout short , pant , sock spray 0.5 % permethrin allow dry . Subjects non-treatment arm scout short , pant , sock spray water allow dry . Subjects follow summer camping season see develop Lyme disease . At 70 day , subject Lyme titer rechecked ensure case Lyme disease document . Following 70 day visit , assessment final study outcome .
